abstract: Vows column on wedding of Serena Powery and Joseph Tillman.
lead_paragraph: Joseph Tillman had decided not to date anyone when he met Serena Powery. So they became friends first.

headline.main: From a ‘Dating Fast’ to a Quick Proposal
headline.print_headline: From Day 1, They Were Not Dating

snippet: Joseph Tillman had decided not to date anyone when he met Serena Powery. So they became friends first.
